sn16.12:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca mahakassapo ayasma ca sariputto baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye.
sn16.12:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma mahakassapo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakassapena saddhim sammodi.
sn16.12:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahakassapam etadavoca:
sn16.12:1.4: “kim nu kho, avuso kassapa, hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn16.12:1.7: “Kim panavuso, na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn16.12:1.10: “Kim nu kho, avuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn16.12:1.12: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn16.12:1.13: “Kim panavuso, neva hoti, na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn16.12:1.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn16.12:1.17: “Na hetam, avuso, atthasamhitam nadibrahmacariyakam na nibbidaya na viragaya na nirodhaya na upasamaya na abhinnaya na sambodhaya na nibbanaya samvattati.
sn16.12:2.7: “Etanhi, avuso, atthasamhitam etam adibrahmacariyakam etam nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
